title: How Long in Pink? Isaac del Toro Packs the Legs to Carry the Lead Into Week 3 of the Giro d’Italia
content:
Isaac del Toro is showing a mix of composure, exuberance that could see him keep the pink jersey at the Giro d'Italia into the decisive final week: 'We'll see what the future holds.'

Read the full article at How Long in Pink? Isaac del Toro Packs the Legs to Carry the Lead Into Week 3 of the Giro d’Italia on Velo.
